abstract: Wal-Mart Stores has bought itself an indirect link to the commercial banking space through a deal to invest in the prepaid debit-card seller Green Dot, The Financial Times reported.
snippet: Wal-Mart Stores has bought itself an indirect link to the commercial banking space through a deal to invest in the prepaid debit-card seller Green Dot, The Financial Times reported.
